entry.summary: RT Christina.lens | violetcrumble.eth 🍫 | ETHMX🇲🇽 Fortunate to work with these individuals across different teams to build web3 social. Please support our @EFDevcon application. Hop into the Devcon Forum to like the proposal to ensure our bid for a Web3 Social Community Hub is selected 💚 Gracias amigos y vamos a Colombia! nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.arweave.dev | nader.lens 🧢: Web3 Social Hub 🌿🪩 If you're planning to be in Bogotá 🇨🇴 for @EFDevcon events and want this to happen, hop into the forum and drop a comment or a like! ❤️ Thank you @shanvasion @Livepeer @AaveAave @LensProtocol @provenauthority @WaverlyMaven + others for spearheading this. 🙏 https://twitter.com/shanvasion/status/1559380280472920065

entry.title: RT Kasiasun 🇺🇦: So happy for our friends from @gitpoap! Let’s bring @github contributions on-chain 🚀
entry.summary:
RT Kasiasun 🇺🇦 So happy for our friends from @gitpoap! Let’s bring @github contributions on-chain 🚀 GitPOAP: We've raised a $4M Seed round to continue memorializing your contributions and accomplishments as GitPOAPs! 🥳
Also, today GitPOAP is ready for any open source Web 2.0 or web3 project to use. Start onboarding here: https://www.theblock.co/post/164246/gitpoap-raises-4-million-to-bring-github-contributions-on-chain https://www.gitpoap.io/onboard

entry.title: RT NerdWithDopeHair: This comes a bit late but I'm officially among the newest members of @developer_dao thanks to @womenbuildweb3 and @dabit3 🥳�...
entry.summary:
RT NerdWithDopeHair This comes a bit late but I'm officially among the newest members of @developer_dao thanks to @womenbuildweb3 and @dabit3 🥳😁. This comes after trying multiple times to join through scholarships & failing. Everything comes full circle it seems!! A huge boost to my web3 journey!
WBW3 #30DaysOfWeb3: At 9am PST (~7 hours from now), we’ll be awarding @developer_dao NFTs, @surge_women NFTs, and @ensdomains to those participating in #30DaysOfWeb3 🎉🏃‍♀️💨 Join the livestream & we’ll give away some prizes to the chat https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=fjLAEKJO15k
